name: Pandemic Pizza
description:
Someone has decided that it would be fun to eat a bat—Little did they know how that... tasty?... meal would change the world. A virus has spread, and everyone has turned into zombies. The government has issued strict stay-at-home orders. Restaurants are closed, parks are closed—the general outside world is closed. People need to eat somehow, though. 

As a pizza shop employee, it is up to you to deliver pizzas to houses to keep them full. You must travel outside—avoiding the dangerous zombies along the way—to find the house that ordered the pizza. Be careful, though. Some houses are occupied by zombies. Make sure you knock on the right door. 

p.s. this is a strange city where addresses are identified by answers to trivia questions.
